passives.name: Gusto
passives.effects: {{tip|Turret}} basic attacks are modified to deal {{as|45% of this minion's '''maximum''' health}} as {{tt|pre-mitigation damage|Damage calculated before modifiers}}.

passives.name: Minion Wounder
passives.effects: Against lane minions, this minion deals {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} on-hit equal to {{as|2% of the target's '''current''' health}}.
